title: Bug 114905: Default value set in list box of report parameter lost after modifying the default value
description: Description: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
OB: No default value was set for the list box of the report parameter.
EB: The list box of the report parameter should retain the default value after modifying it. The OK button should be grayed out after step 5.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Create a new report parameter and set the Display type to List Box. 2. Input three values: 'aa', 'bb', 'cc', and set 'aa' as the default value. Click OK. 3. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog, and modify 'aa' to 'aaa'. Click OK directly. 4. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog. 5. Follow these steps to observe the issue.
